DOC.brief_summary: This study aim verify effect Thrust Versus Non-thrust Manipulation Pain , Trunk Proprioception Postural Stability Subjects With Chronic Low Back Pain .
DOC.brief_title: Thrust Versus Non-thrust Manipulation Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Forty individual chronic low back pain randomly assign , researcher involve data collection , two treatment group : Thrust manipulation ( side-lying rotational manipulation standardize L4-L5 level ) non-thrust manipulation ( side-lying grade III rotational non-thrust manipulation ) . A single treatment session provide . Outcome measurement conduct immediately treatment session . Data collect blind assessor . Between-group difference calculate construct mixed linear model follow intention-to-treat principle .
